parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Unassign and delete existing item from its assigned slot. If item does not exist or is not in the assigned slot, command simply fails.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unit [[unlinkItem]] item

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> item: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>bluforUnit [[unlinkItem]] "NVGoggles";
opforUnit [[unlinkItem]] "NVGoggles_OPFOR";
independentUnit [[unlinkItem]] "NVGoggles_INDEP";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[linkItem]], [[addItem]], [[assignItem]], [[removeItem]], [[unassignItem]], [[assignedItems]], [[removeAllAssignedItems]]
</value></part></template>

<comment><!-- CONTINUE Notes -->
</comment><dl class="command_description">
<dd class="notedate">Posted on October 15, 2018 - 14:46 (UTC)</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:killzone_kid|killzone_kid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">
With this command you can also unlink [[vest]], [[uniform]] and [[headgear]]
</dd>
